mapper.sql: id, class_name, method_name, code_body, method_param_type, field_type, gmt_create, gmt_update
mapper.insert: insert into rule_class_info (id, class_name, method_name, code_body, method_param_type, field_type, gmt_create, gmt_update) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodParamType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
class_name,

mapper.update:
update rule_class_info
class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code_body = #{codeBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_param_type = #{methodParamType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_type = #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rule_class_info set class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_body = #{codeBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_param_type = #{methodParamType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_type = #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from rule_class_info where class_name = #{templateName} and method_name =#{templateMethodName}
